courses.subject: ACPY
courses.title: Guided Studies
courses.description: To attend seminars/workshops and carry out assignments for the purposes of increasing knowledge of the research area and improving experimental design and data analysis.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MPhil Anatomical and Cellular Pathology
courses.learning_outcomes:
- To acquire the ability to formulate relevant research questions.
- To perform a comprehensive literature review & identify and access bibliographical resources, databases and other sources of relevant information.
- To cultivate critical thinking and learning skill.
- To acquire the communication and writing skill.
courses.course_syllabus: You will conduct the activities included review written, attendance in research group meeting, and presentation of the research topics and skills related to their postgraduate study and assigned by the respective teacher or supervisor.
courses.feedback_evaluation: Individual Student-Supervisor meeting will be conducted each year.
courses.required_readings: The required readings will be assigned by the respective teacher or supervisor.
courses.recommended_readings: The recommended readings will be suggested by the respective teacher or supervisor.

courses.subject: ACPY
courses.title: Seminar
courses.description: To present a seminar summarizing research work performed in the previous term/year.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MPhil Anatomical and Cellular Pathology
courses.learning_outcomes:
- To enhance presentation skill.
- To enhance communication skill & engagement in meaningful and critical scientific discussion.
courses.course_syllabus: You will conduct two 30-minute presentations with Q & A section that are related to your research project and a selected published article. The topics will be assigned or approved by the respective teacher or supervisor. You will attend and participate in the discussion of the class seminars and journal club presentation.
courses.feedback_evaluation: Individual Student-Supervisor meeting will be conducted each year.
courses.required_readings: The required readings will be assigned by the respective teacher or supervisor
courses.recommended_readings: The recommended readings will be suggested by the respective teacher or supervisor.

courses.subject: ACPY
courses.title: Research
courses.description: To conduct laboratory-based research work on the assigned research topic.
courses.enrollment_requirement: For students in MPhil Anatomical and Cellular Pathology
courses.learning_outcomes:
- To acquire the ability to formulate and tackle relevant research questions.
- To cultivate critical thinking and data analysis skill.
- To acquire and consolidate experimental and analytic skill.
- To acquire the ability to derive appropriate study conclusion.
- To acquire the ability to work as a team.
courses.course_syllabus: You will conduct research project assigned and approved by the respective teacher or supervisor. You will discuss the research plan and report the project progress to the respective teacher or supervisor.
courses.feedback_evaluation: Individual Student-Supervisor meeting will be conducted each year.
courses.required_readings: The required readings will be assigned by the respective teacher or supervisor.
courses.recommended_readings: The recommended readings will be suggested by the respective teacher or supervisor.
